definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
to carve/carved words/to agree/a contract/a deed

sentences.english: Paul wants Christians to be governed by common sense that looks out for their fellow brother or sister.
sentences.chinese: 保罗要基督徒凭着常识为他们团契的弟兄姐妹着想。

sentences.english: This is the question of fellowship.
God has wired us to need each other; we need community.
sentences.chinese: 神使我们每个人互相连接，我们需要团契。

sentences.english: Pray for each fellowship and group, pray for their2007 new ministry and their needs.
sentences.chinese: 为各团契小组即将展开的新事工及所需要的同工代祷。

sentences.english: Pray for the development of children fellowship.
Fellowship leaders, please contact Lao Ho to update information of your fellowship.
sentences.chinese: 若资料需要更改，请团契负责人与贺陈隽联络。

sentences.english: I discovered that in my community with mentally handicapped people.
sentences.chinese: 我在智障者的团契中发现了这点。

sentences.english: Still remember the last BBQ fellowship we have with Hosanna Fellowship?
sentences.chinese: 还记得上一次我们与和散那团契间的烧烤团契吗？

sentences.english: Still remember the last BBQ fellowship we have with Hosanna Fellowship?
sentences.chinese: 还记得上一次我们与和散那团契间的烧烤团契吗？

sentences.english: Greenbelt Fellowship is a Cantonese-speaking Christian fellowship.
sentences.chinese: 绿带团契是一个粤语团契。

sentences.english: Greenbelt Fellowship is a Cantonese-speaking Christian fellowship.
sentences.chinese: 绿带团契是一个粤语团契。

sentences.english: The couple too enjoys preparing refreshments for the group, together with sister Fang Min.
sentences.chinese: 他们也与芳敏姊妹一同享受以预备茶点服事团契。

sentences.english: After graduating, I will go back Vietnam and work in FES ministry (Fellowship of Evangelical Student).
sentences.chinese: 毕业以后，我将回到越南在基督徒福音团契服事。

sentences.english: You need to be a part of a church and community.
sentences.chinese: 你得成为教会和团契的一部分。

sentences.english: Apart from this, our fellowship has groups responsible for visitations to the hospitals and Old Folks' Homes.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，本团契亦有小组负责探访医院及老人院。

sentences.english: Pray for the building needs in fellowships and worship.

definition: to pray on behalf of sb
the will of Heaven/the will of God
